notes: Recommended; excellent X68000 emulation with fully configurable peripheral cards; supports MIDI output to hardware devices like MT-32 or SC-55; requires BIOS files (cgrom.dat and iplrom.dat)

Recommended; considerably faster than MAME on both PC and mobile; libretro core only; configurable CPU clock speeds and RAM options; requires BIOS files in system/keropi/ directory (cgrom.dat and iplrom.dat); saves written directly to disk images
